channel.title: [Delta] [317] ::changename command? [317] [Delta]
channel.description:
hey, can someone please give me the code for the ::changename command?
like when a player does ::changename lol
it says, your new username is lol and it changes there username to 'lol'?
how would i go about adding this and what would the code be?

item.dc:creator: @mrpopyman mrpopyman
item.description:
@mrpopyman wrote:

can some1 just plz help!?!?!

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] [317] ::changename command? [317] [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

I added public String username

to Player.java, however when I did the command instead of just changing the name it creates a whole new cahracter file. So people could just do it and double there bank.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] [317] ::changename command? [317] [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @mrpopyman mrpopyman
item.description:
@mrpopyman wrote:

[quote=“mistakengod, post:7, topic:402826”]if (playerCommand.startsWith("changepassword") && playerCommand.length() > 15) { c.playerPass = playerCommand.substring(15); c.sendMessage("Your password is now: " + c.playerPass);

try something like :

if (playerCommand.startsWith("changeusername") && playerCommand.length() > 15) { c.playerName = playerCommand.substring(15); c.sendMessage("Your Username is now: " + c.playerName);

guess u’ve to change the substring to another number.[/quote]

none of the above worked

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] [317] ::changename command? [317] [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("changepassword") && playerCommand.length() > 15) { c.playerPass = playerCommand.substring(15); c.sendMessage("Your password is now: " + c.playerPass);

try something like :

if (playerCommand.startsWith("changeusername") && playerCommand.length() > 15) { c.playerName = playerCommand.substring(15); c.sendMessage("Your Username is now: " + c.playerName);

guess u’ve to change the substring to another number.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] [317] ::changename command? [317] [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

if(command.startsWith("changename")) { String newName = command.substring(10); playerName = newName; savefile = true; disconnected = true; }
Could possibly work, depends on your src.

Read full topic

@mrpopyman wrote:

Copy your changing password command [commonly named ::changepassword] and just make a few edits.

here is my ::changepassword command:

if (command.startsWith("changepassword") && command.length() > 15) { playerPass = command.substring(15); sM("Your new pass is \""+command.substring(15)+"\""); }

can u plz tell me what to do, im really confused
